definitions.definition: A pseudoscientific treatment in which two pointed metal rods (" tractors ") were waved over the body , supposed to cure inflammation , rheumatism , etc. by drawing off an electrical fluid .

main_definition: ( medicine , archaic ) A pseudoscientific treatment in which two pointed metal rods (" tractors ") were waved over the body , supposed to cure inflammation , rheumatism , etc. by drawing off an electrical fluid .
